  • Uses of Piece in edu.wisc.game.engine

    Methods in edu.wisc.game.engine with parameters of type Piece 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean RuleSet.Atom.acceptsColorShapeAndProperties​(Piece p, Expression.VarMap2 varMap)
    Does this atom accept a specified piece, based on its shape, color, and (in GS3+) any other properties? Since GS5, the "code:" field of the atom is also taken into account.

    Constructor Description
    Board​(Piece[] pieces, Piece[] removedPieces, BitSet[] moveableTo)
